full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title:
Heavy Equipment Supply, Diving, and Waste Disposal - Maaqtusiis Harbour, Ahousat, BC

## Tender Information:

* Reference Number: PW-22-01009537
* Solicitation Number: 30003276
* Publication Date: October 7, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: October 25, 2022 13:00:00
* Amendment Number: 1
* Amendment Date: October 12, 2022

## Contract Information:

* Contracting Entity: Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* End-User Entity: Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

## Tender Description:

The Government of Canada invites bids for the supply of heavy equipment, diving services, and waste disposal at Maaqtusiis Harbour, Ahousat, BC. The project involves two rounds of removal and disposal of waste material located in the Harbour Basin of Maaqtusiis Small Craft Harbour.

## Work Scope:

* Supply of equipment and personnel for standard heavy marine construction
* Supply of equipment and personnel for a standard diving crew
* Towing and disposal of waste material

## Mandatory Requirements:

* The contractor must supply all necessary materials to complete the project
* The contractor must work around tides, understand tide cycles, and provide accurate hourly tidal elevation data
* The contractor must provide equipment and labour to meet all National and Provincial laws and regulations for Commercial Diving
* The contractor must have a minimum of $5,000,000.00 marine liability insurance

## Contract Documents:

The tender documents, including specifications, can be found at [link to Canada Buys]. The tender documents are available in English and French.

## Contact Information:

For any questions or concerns regarding this tender, please contact Karine Plante at [DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca) or 506-377-9127.

Note: I deleted all information that was not relevant to the tasks at hand, including government notices and headers to make the text more concise. 
Rewritten Entry is formatted in nice markdown.  Arrival Date is made to appear more natural. Note: Going beyond the 400 character limit might result in Code-Frame errors on line-fed systems.   Every item was checked and (non standard elements bypassed.
